tweakermore.config.autoFillContainerThre:
The minimum occupied slot amount for the item to trigger tweak tweakmAutoFillContainer
e.g. if you always have 2 slots of firework rocket you can set the value to 3,
 then your rockets will never be used to fill the container
tweakermore.config.bossBarMaxEntry.comme:
Overwrites the maximum amount of boss bar to be displayed at the same time
It will also skip the vanilla windowHeight/3 limit check
Set it to -1 to disabled (use vanilla logic)
tweakermore.config.bossBarScale.comment: Scale the boss bar hud with given factor
tweakermore.config.chatMessageLimit.comm: Modify the maximum number of history messages stored in the chat hud
tweakermore.config.connectionSimulatedDe:
Client network delay simulator. Enabled when the value is greater than 0
Adds given delay (in milliseconds) before any packet processing
Basically it stably adds your ping to the server with the given value
tweakermore.config.legacyF3NLogic.commen:
Modify the logic of hotkey F3 + N back to 1.15 and before
1.15- logic cheat sheet: creative -> spectator, other -> creative
tweakermore.config.maxChatHudHeight.comm: The maximum height of the chat hud
tweakermore.config.netherPortalSoundChan:
The chance for a nether portal block to play sound
Set it to 0.001 or 0.0001 for less noisy portal
tweakermore.config.safeAfkHealthThreshol:
The threshold of the health of the player which triggers the safe afk disconnecting feature
Disconnect when player takes damage and its health becomes less than the given value
tweakermore.config.scoreboardSideBarScal: Scale the scoreboard side bar hud with given factor
tweakermore.config.shulkerTooltipEnchant: Display enchantments of items in the tooltip of shulker box item
tweakermore.config.villagerOfferUsesDisp:
Display villager offer use and limit amount on villager offer list
Hover on the arrow of the offer to see it
tweakermore.config.copySignTextToClipBoa: Copy texts in the sign you are pointing to into the clipboard
You are not pointing to a sign block
tweakermore.config.refreshInventory.comm:
Request a player inventory refresh to the server
It's done by simulating an invalid inventory dragging operation,
so the server think that the inventory is out of sync then do resync
tweakermore.config.handRestockListType.c: The item restriction type for tweakHandRestock
The items that will trigger tweakHandRestock
The items that will NOT trigger tweakHandRestock
tweakermore.config.prioritizedCommandSug:
Command suggestions in this list will be more forward in the command completion list
You can put those command completions you always prefer to choose in this list
so they will always be at the head of the command completion list
tweakermore.config.tweakmAutoCleanContai:
Automatically drops everything in the opened container
and then close the container
Dropped all items in %1$s slots inside %2$s
tweakermore.config.tweakmAutoFillContain:
Automatically fill the opened container with the most numerous item stack in your inventory
iff the item stack is the only most numerous one
and then close the container
Most suitable item to fill the container not found
tweakermore.config.tweakmAutoPickSchemat:
Pick block from schematic automatically before block placement
It's logic is the same as the pickBlock tweaks in litematica mod, you need to enable pickBlockEnabled option in litematica
Does not work with easy place mode
tweakermore.config.tweakmSafeAfk.comment:
Disconnect when receive damage
Health threshold to disconnect can be set via safeAfkHealthThreshold
tweakermore.config.disablePistonBlockBre: Remove block breaking particles when pistons break blocks
tweakermore.config.applyTweakerMoreOptio: Apply the TweakerMore style translated text + original text label to all config GUIs using malilib
tweakermore.config.eCraftItemScrollerCom:
Fixed some item scroller functionality doesn't work with easier crafting mod
e.g. broken mass craft
tweakermore.config.ofUnlockF3FpsLimit.co: Removed 10 FPS render limit for F3 debug hud
tweakermore.config.xmapNoSessionFinaliza:
Skip the session finalization operation of xaero's worldmap when quit a world
So no lag when quitting server or single player
Might have some side effects though
tweakermore.config.tweakmTradyLapis.comm:
[TIS] 1.13 cleric lapis trading helper
1. Trade 1x rotten fresh to unlock lapis
2. Trade lapis if lapis trade is 1->2
3. Trade 1x redstone dust if lapis trade locks and never trades redstone
tweakermore.config.tweakmTradyFarmer.com:
[TIS] 1.13 farmer trading helper
Trade and sell all crops except wheat and melon
Items to trade can be modified in list options tradyFarmerTargets
tweakermore.config.tradyThrowIfFull.comm: Throw the output item out if the inventory is full instead of cancelling the attempt when using trading helper
tweakermore.config.tradyFarmerTargets.co: Crop items to be sold for emerald with farmer trading helper
tweakermore.config.hideDisabledOptions.c: Hide options which are disabled due to mod relations unsatisfied in the config GUI
tweakermore.config.openTweakerMoreConfig: Open the config GUI of TweakerMore
tweakermore.config.preserveConfigUnknown:
Preserve unknown config entries in TweakerMore's config file
If set to false, unknown entries will be removed on config being written
Debug mode of TweakerMore
When enabled, debug parameter options and options not supported by the current Minecraft version will be displayed
and debugging related functions will be enabled
tweakermore.config.tweakerMoreDebugInt.c: A integer parameter for TweakerMore debugging
tweakermore.config.tweakerMoreDebugDoubl: A double parameter for TweakerMore debugging
tweakermore.gui.title: TweakerMore v%1$s Config GUI
tweakermore.gui.trigger_button.hover:
Click to trigger %1$s once
§7§oThis will simulate hotkey pressed and released in order§r
